Text:
Audio is muted in different sections of the avi file...

Shame, as video is 8/10 with hard encoded English subs for foreign parts only...

Thank you to the uploader for the effort though.

are you sure MONGDESADE? i watched it all the way through twice and it seemed fine to me. you might be thinking that because the interpreter's voice is somewhat muted, but the film maker did that on purpose as it's not meant to be a part of the film's audio.
